data.title: black bears & biscuits lodge
data.text:
PIGEON FORGE

22 Guests

6 Bedrooms

6 Full Bathrooms

Amenities

Floor Plan

Video

Gallery

Endless amenities & stunning mountain views await your family at the BLACK BEARS & BISCUITS LODGE! The vaulted ceilings tower at 17 & 26 feet high & allow for large windows, featuring breathtaking views of the surrounding Smoky Mountains. Having a family meal together has never been more enjoyable with both indoor AND outdoor kitchens. Inside, Kitchen Aid appliances, double convection oven, & microwave drawer make meal prep easy! Outside, relish in the great outdoors by firing up the 10 foot projection screen in the outdoor theater space. Inside, there's a fully packed game room complete with Bluetooth speaker system, foosball multigame arcade, ping pong, & a Playstation & X box systems with HDMI compatibility. An 18-person home theater with 12-foot screen makes the perfect place to watch all your favorite movies. Of course there's a bubbling hot tub too. All of this in a gated community with pool & a tennis court. Make memories for life at BLACK BEARS & BISCUITS LODGE!

LEAVE A REVIEW

Thank you for submitting your review. It will be processed shortly!

by Brenda M.

This is the second time we have rented through American Patriots. Both cabins were wonderful. Thank you!

by A Wilkins

It Was Perfect

by K. HOWERTON

We stayed for Thanksgiving week, and it was perfect. We maxed out this cabin with a family of 22 and had plenty of space. A few broken items were addressed before we checked in and were fixed during our stay. The staff was very nice and responsive to all of our calls. The trip up the mountain was a bit harsh for us Cajuns but we made it without any real issues. We can't wait to get back to the Smoky Mountains!

by Joshua grady Grady

by Alisha Withers

WONDERFUL!

by The Marcers

Wonderful family vacation for our crew of 17. House was WONDERFUL for a large family! Location was great and view are spectacular. Also enjoyed our daily visits from the bears. The bears also enjoyed visiting the beds of our trunks!! 🙂 Would love to stay but must return to the coast of N.C.

by Angela Williams

The expectation from the pictures when we got to the cabin were dead on! The cabin was perfect for our family party of 14! Everyone had a bedroom that was similar with wonderful bathrooms and the kids had a great 1st floor with all the fun games that kep t them busy. Would definitely recommend this property and book again with the family

by Neely Oldham

We loved the cabin. We come every year and this is the nicest cabin we have rented. We will be coming back. The decor all thru the cabin was beautiful. Loved the view. Our yountest is 15 and the oldest is 70 and all enjoyed our stay. We met the owner of the cabin and he was super nice. The Martin and Oldham family-Carthage, Tn.

by Teresa Pennell

We absolutely loved our stay!!! This was our first time renting a cabin for Christmas, and we will absolutely be doing so again. Thanks so much!!!

by Tanya Colegrove

Perfection! Our family hokiday trip was amazing in this cabin. From the decor, the games, the space... Perfection! So happy we found this lodge and will rent this again! Thank you and Merry Christmas!

by Doug Peavler

Thank you for sharing your beautiful cabin with us. We had a wonderful family weekend. We especially enjoyed the games and theater room. It was beautifully decorated for Christmas. Christmas in every room, tree was awesome!

by Aisha Stack

The pictures did not do this cabin justice. Not only was it breathtaking, it was clean & Beautifully decorated for Christmas. Even thought the theater room was not functional for our stay, we made the best of it. The veiws were absolutely spectacular! The weather was perfect for enjoying the moutnasin. This cabinwas one of the best we have stayed in & prayerfully we will return one day.

by Fredricka Mitchell

We came as a group of 15 from Alabama & Mississippi. We love everything, we hadso much fun. Great view. Amazing service from host. We came back to relax and get away and this cabin did just that! Thank you we will be back soon! -Down SouthDivas

by Michelle Deschamp

We are here from Kilm Ms with family and friends for my son's wedding! The cabin was amazing. We could not have imagined anything better. The views were incredible. Thank you for sharing your wonderful cabin with us this week!

by Daniel Bergfors

We came together from Crawfordsville, In, Cenver Co, and Warham Ma to celebratemy 60th Birthday! Had a wonderful time with my family. Gorgeous home, beautiful views, curious little bear cubs with thier mama looking for scraps - none to be found. We will certainly be back!!

by Nicholas Taflan

Such a special beautiful place to celebrate our parents 50th anniversary and mom's 70th birthday. Breathtaking views, wonderful accommodations, plenty of space and things to stay busy. Priceless memories. Thank you. My Wife and I were very pleasantly suprized when our 3 children told us they were taking us the the Tennessee mountains for our 50th anniversary. We've lived in the country in Ohio since we bouild our log home in 1976, butit's nothing as fantastic as our short stay in this beautiful location. Thank you very much for sharing this residense.

by Providence church International inc

Enjoyed every minute. Very beautiful experience. Tiem well spend with family. Never thought I was a mountain girl, but this place proved me wrong. Would come back again and again.

by Gabrielle Blevins

We brought a youth group from Grundy Ua. Had a great time learning about our lord & Savior Jesus Christ! John 3:16 For God so loved the world he gave his only begotten son that whosoever believe in him shall not perish but have everlastinglife! The cabin was beautiful, the view was amazing! We never saw any bears but we were a noisy bunch. Favorites: balcony, theatre, and view.

by Jackie Suder

First time in Tennessee. Truly a Smoky Mountain Paradise!!! What an amazing gorgeous cabin, an unforgettable vacay for 17 of us from Cleveland, Ohio. FYI: Do not leave the hatch open on your pick-up. Mama Bear will drag out the strollerchecking for cherrios to feed her 3 baby bears.

by Shekia Peoples-armour

My family and I really enjoyed staying at Biscuits and Bears. There was plenty to do at the cabin for the 3 days we were there, but we wanted to see the city. The maintenance guy had to come out twice due to the thunderstorms knocking the lights out, but h e was prompt and friendly when he arrived. It was awesome seeing actual bears and a raccoon on the property. I give this cabin a 10 out of 10.

by Kacie Schexnaydre

Absolutely loved the cabin! So beautiful!

by Ginger Albano

12 out of 10 stars. Didn't want to leave. Best Griswold Family Vacation EVER!! Many Memories made. Will never forget this cabin! Made the effort to wake up early and watch the sunrise. There's nothing better. John & Alicia Boeleus We got to take an amazing and MUCH needed vacation with a group of amazing people.Cabin was AMAZING and the views were just unimaginable. It's a shame that we had to leave but soon, we will be back. Emily and Derek Schubert Family vacation, group of 14. Cabin was more than epected. Breathtaking views.Had a bear visit us within three hours of arrival. Plenty to keep the youngercrowd entertained & quiet places for the adults. Awesome location! Damen, Ginger, Brandon, and Alex Albano - Thank you!!! Spent the week with my daughter & her family - my son & his family, me & my husband! Awesome week! Cabin is beautiful- Bears added attraction. View is gorgeous! Best vacation ever! Mike & Vickie Mcfarlane

by Caleb Rees

My favorite place so far has been here! Had my children, grand children, and my future husband in the place I saw as paradise! Thank you! PS. The bears were an added bonus!

by Jackie Calhoun

We complately enjoyed our family vacay here. Had numerous bear visits & this home is amazing! Such a relaxing & beautiful scenery. Until next time.

by Justin Martinez

This cabin blew our entire family away it brought tears to some eyes the pictures do not do the view justice one morning the horizon was lit up in a beautiful orange as the sun rised the next it was overcast but could see the mountains looking amazing cove red looking exactly as they are the smokey mountains the rooms amazing plenty of places to gather and large enough to have your privacy we even got lots of black bears everyday except the day we arrived truly a memorable vacation for our family

by Jake Meyer

Loved every minute of our stay. Even the pictures don't justify how beautiful the house was. Highly recommend!

by Theresa Ashworth

by Ediana Nascimento

Beautiful cabin with a breathtaking view- My son & daughter-in-law were married on the balcony of this cabin. The pictures are beautiful but somehow don't capture all that it has to offer. Thank you for providing us with such a wonderful experience & beautiful memories!

by Karen Cline

The cabin was beautiful. We had a family trip of 15. The cabin was better than the discription posted on the website. We had snow the first night and the view looked like a painting. This is a cabin we would recommend to anyone who needed a cabin this size . Thanks for the great vacation.

by Jeff Lee

From the Lee family & friends, we came for a family Christmas from Iowa and spent New Years here with both family and friends. It was the perfect location and everyone loved the gorgeous cabin and views. We were supposed to leave today, but woke up to approximately 7 inches of snow and the most beautiful views! We were without power or water but we have been boiling snow for hot water and have plenty of food. We are enjoying our Smoky Mountain Adventure to the fullest! Thank you, your cabin is amazing !

by Teresa Rivera

From the Rivera & Benitez family, what a lovely vacation with wonderful memories with a beautiful backdrop. We enjoyed every inch of the home that made it easy to feel like home. Leaving bubbles for the bath for the next guest to enjoy. Thank you & big hug to our black bear friends!

by Rochelle Peoples

Thank you for an amazing time. My family and I traveled from Ohio to the great Smoky Mountains. We enjoyed Cades Coves, the Paks, and the Attractions as well. We loved the cabin. It is truly Home away from home. You had EVERYETHING we needed. The outdoor fireplace was great as well as the theater room. The rooms were very large. I appreciate the large TV's in Every room. Thank you Again!!! The Peoples Family

by Ranee Aspey

The cabin was amazing and the scenery was breathtaking! With a dozen or so small children the theater room adn game room was a life saver, they all loved every minute of it. Our wedding ceremony infront of the living room windows was perfect. Thank you for this beautiful experience. Sincerely, Tim & Jessica Winstead

by Katrina Husband

Thank you so much for such a great time! We truly enjoyed our time and will definitely be back. We LOVED seeing the cub 🙂 Thank you again!!! The Harris Family

by Susan Dewitt

We all had such an amazing time. We came down for our moms wedding a a bear cubshowed up at the ceremony and a few other times. The views and house are so pretty. There is also so many fun things to do around here. Cole & Hannah, Sara & Ray, Linda Susan &Tim, Ddrienne & Joe, Jessica & Daylynn, Lynda & Jenny

by Sally Anderson

We had a wonderful time in this fabulous house. We saw bears on 3 different days, mostly in the back and once on the side porch with the grill!!! Then he went down to explore the hot tub deck. Most of us, except us Seniors, rode the Alpine Coaster, go carts, bumper cars, shopped at The Christmas Place and spent Wed. at Dollywood (almost No wait time!) We all loved the game room and theater! The view is amazing espeically the sun coming up over the mountain!

by Nathaniel Mitchell

We got married on the deck. Scenery was breathtaking. We loved seeing the bears. The cabin was amazing. I thing the adults loved the oudoor space the mostand the kids loved the movie theater. We couldn't have asked for a Better Place!

by Chris Majchrowicz

Cabin and amenities were amazing. I have been a hotel manager for 30 years and the cleanliness was outstanding. We had an amazing visit!

by Parris Smith

by Clyde Daugherty

LOVED LOVED LOVED this cabin! By far our best experience. Everything was fantastic, location, space, cleanliness, affordability. 5 stars all around. Beaitiful cabin with amazing views. The cabin was very clean and we loved the decorations. We saw a mama bear and her two cubs. We would stay here again.

by Shelia & ronnie Anderson

There was much beauty at this cabin. Beautiful views, decor, and the beautiful and awesome amazement of seeing bears 3 days of our stay. We saw a mama bear with her 2 cubs one day and a bigger male bear the next. And on the third day wesaw a big male bear. The weather was beautiful while we stayed. Sunny but very warm. We saw a rainbow and experianced rain and the smoky fog of the Smokies and 3 hummingbirds. Wow!

by Eric Horvat

We came for a graduation trip from 7/3 to 7/7/21. It could not have been more perfect! We saw 7 bears (so awesome!) and made friends with a raccoon, rode gocarts, mini golf, hiked, rode the mountain coaster, and had an amazing white water rafting experience. We will be back!

by Roxanne & thomas Mateja

Traveled from Chicago IL and Englewood FL for a Great Smokies Vacation. Loved this cabin! Best view of the week. All the kids jumped at the sinks! Swam in the river and picnicked. We loved River Rat Tubing! Another highlight was when the black bear walked right by the cabin and through the driveway of cars. Everyone got to see it! Fun week! Great cabin! Will be back!

by Christy Fields

Traveled from Florida and Arizona. We had 18 family members ranging from 2 yo - 86 yo. Activities included Gatlinburg, Rat tubing, Dolly Parton's Stampede, trout fishing, mountain roller coasters, sky bridge, waterfalls, caverns and amazing family time in this beautiful cabin. This place is amazing. Thank you for an amazing week of beautiful memories!

by Crystal Weary

What a wonderful trip! Beautiful view and cabin was great. The kids enjoyed all the games and movies. The added bonus was mama bear and her 2 cubs, which came right up to the stairs. We will be back, thanks for the memories!

by Michelle dodd Dodd

We had a wonderful week here at the cabin. Can't beat the view and cabin decor. hope to return some day!!

by Kateland Proffit

Amazing view, amazing cabin. Beyond happy this is where I got to catch up and spend time with my now expanded family.

by Dwayne Blackburn

This cabin was the perfect retreat for the Blackburn, Smith & Starks Family! The cabin offers all of the special amenities of mountain cabin living. The spa shower features was a special treat for total relaxation. The kitchen/living room area was very spacious, which allowed for family bonding! Our family will definately visit visit this resort again in the near future!

by Katrice Gulley

by Faye Kleman

We had the most Amazing long weekend at this cabin! By far it ranks as our #1 cabin in decades of coming to The Smokies. For ten years we have rented through patriot and finally we are "home".

by Karen Riese

Really enjoyed our stay at your beautiful home in the mountains. Loved the view and all of the ammenities. We especially got a kick out of seeing a Mama Bear and 3 cubs! Looking for some food, we're sure! Thanks for a wonderful visit!!

by Jennifer Marlowe

We truly enjoyed our time in the lodge. Provided our families a fun filled time away. The view is absolutely amazing. We look forward to visiting again.

by Cindy Sligh

We had a great time and will be back next year.

by Donna Wilson

Wow!! What a cabin - this will be our cabin of choice from now on. Great Views - something for everyone to do!

by Theresa Ashworth

Had a wonderful long weekend in this beautiful cabin with the most remarkable views ever! The cabin was furnished as though it was someone's home and not a rental unit. The attention to detail in the decor was second to none. We loved it so much we boo ked it for next year while we were there!

by Jennifer Owner

Beautiful cabin. So nicely done. The view is amazing and we loved the outdoor living space. Will definitely be back! The Saxtons

by Sergey Kamyanskiy

Shostak, Kaminskiy, Struck failies love the cabin - Beautiful Views.

by Kelli Perry

Gorgeous cabin and views! Everything was top notch!

by Michael Allen

This cabin was everything we wanted and more for a fun filled weekend. We seen 4 black bears from a distance, watched a lot of football and ate a lot of chili. Thank you for allowing us to spend this special weekend in such a special place. We already booked for next year!

by Dominique Askew

Black Bears & Biscuits was everything and more! This view is amazing. We celebrated a birthday AND engagement and couldn't have selected a more perfect place. We will be back for sure.

by Jason Luevano

This was the most amazing cabin that we've ever stayed in and we will most definitely be back! Every detail of the cabin was incredible. The view is spectacular and we absolutely loved sitting outside on the porch by the fire every night. Thank you so much for this amazing week!

by Michelle Crenshaw

This is the best cabin! Our family came to celebrate my 51st birthday and we enjoyed every moment in this cabin! Black Bears and Biscuits is the best! The view is beautiful/amazing! Each room has it's owner unique touch! This is the best and we will definitely be coming back making this an annual vacation! I must agree this cabin is breath taking!!! The Snead and Peacock Family had a BLAST!!!

by Bryan Mcconner

Myfamily and I had a wonderful time property was awesome we'll definitely stay there again.

by Isaac Cadle

Incredible cabin all of my guests were super impressed. We will be back!
